conversation.text: I just got tickets for a Beatles concert this Friday. Can you create an event for me?

metadata.reflection: Respond to user with: "Respond to user with: "Certainly! I need a bit more information to create the event for you. What day and time does the concert start and end? Also, do you want to invite anyone to this event? If so, please provide their usernames.""

conversation.text: It goes from 8-11 at Madison Square Garden.
I've created the event for you.
